content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Setup at position (1, 1) and (3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (1.0, 1.0)) with fuel inventory containing coal and source inventory containing iron ore.
- Stone furnace (position (3.0, 0.0)) with fuel inventory containing coal and source inventory containing iron ore.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnaces have enough space in their source inventory to accept the items being inserted. Check the inventory levels before inserting.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when the furnaces have produced enough output. Verify the output inventory of the furnaces before extraction.

### Errors when using stale entity data
- Regularly refresh the entity data to ensure that you are working with the most current state of the game. This can help avoid issues related to outdated information.
